name: kometa
tagline: A metadata automation tool for organizing media server libraries
description: Kometa is a metadata and library management tool for Plex or related media servers. It uses configuration files and scripts to create collections, apply artwork and keep libraries organized automatically, tailored for self hosted media setups.

features.title: Automatic Collections
features.description: Create dynamic collections based on genres, actors, directors, and more. Organize libraries intelligently

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Apply posters, backgrounds, and overlays to media automatically. Keep libraries visually appealing

features.title: Metadata Enhancement
features.description: Enrich media metadata from multiple sources like TMDb and IMDb. Improve library information

features.title: Yaml Configuration
features.description: Define library management rules in version-controlled YAML files. Automate maintenance declaratively

features.title: Scheduled Updates
features.description: Run maintenance tasks on schedules to keep libraries current. Set and forget automation

features.title: Template System
features.description: Use community templates or create custom ones for common patterns. Standardize library organization

features.title: Overlay Support
features.description: Add rating, resolution, and audio overlays to posters. Visual indicators for media quality

features.title: Award Collections
features.description: Automatically create collections for Oscar winners, Emmy winners, and more. Highlight acclaimed content
